content.query:
CREATE TABLE dim_date (
    ts datetime,
    dayofweek int,
    dayofmonth int,
    weekofyear int,
    quarter int,
    month int,
    year int
)
DECLARE @StartDate DATETIME
DECLARE @EndDate DATETIME
SET @StartDate = (SELECT MIN(TRY_CONVERT(datetime, LEFT(start_at, 19))) FROM staging_trip)
SET @EndDate = DATEADD(year, 5, (SELECT MAX(TRY_CONVERT(datetime, left(start_at, 19))) FROM staging_trip))
WHILE @StartDate <= @EndDate
      BEGIN
             INSERT INTO [dim_date]
             SELECT
                   @StartDate,
                   DATEPART(WEEKDAY, @StartDate),
                   DATEPART(DAY, @StartDate),
                   DATEPART(WEEK, @StartDate),
                   DATEPART(QUARTER, @StartDate),
                   DATEPART(MONTH, @StartDate),
                   DATEPART(YEAR, @StartDate)
             SET @StartDate = DATEADD(dd, 1, @StartDate)
      END

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDelimitedTextFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
			))
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'udacitybikeshareproject_udacitybikeshareproject_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [udacitybikeshareproject_udacitybikeshareproject_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://udacitybikeshareproject@udacitybikeshareproject.dfs.core.windows.net', 
		TYPE = HADOOP 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.dim_riders
WITH (
    LOCATION     = 'dim_riders',
    DATA_SOURCE = [udacitybikeshareproject_udacitybikeshareproject_dfs_core_windows_net],
    FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
)  
AS
SELECT 
    [rider_id],
	[first] AS first_name,
	[last] AS last_name,
	[address],
	TRY_CONVERT (DATE, LEFT([birthday], 10)) AS birthday,
	TRY_CONVERT (DATE, LEFT([account_start_date], 10)) AS account_start_date,
	TRY_CONVERT (DATE, LEFT([account_end_date], 10)) AS account_end_date, 
	[is_member]
FROM [dbo].[staging_rider];
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.dim_riders
GO

-- DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.dim_riders
-- GO

	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = TRUE
			))
GO

	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://udacitybikeshareproject@udacitybikeshareproject.dfs.core.windows.net', 
		TYPE = HADOOP

    LOCATION     = 'fact_payment',

SELECT

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.fact_trip
WITH (
    LOCATION     = 'fact_trip',
    DATA_SOURCE = [udacitybikeshareproject_udacitybikeshareproject_dfs_core_windows_net],
    FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
)  
AS
SELECT 
    [trip_id],
	[rideable_type],
	TRY_CONVERT (DATE, LEFT(st.[start_at], 10)) AS started_at,
	TRY_CONVERT (DATE, LEFT(st.[ended_at], 10)) AS ended_at,
	[start_station_id],
	[end_station_id],
	st.[rider_id],
	TRY_CONVERT (DATE, LEFT([birthday], 10)) AS birthday,
	DATEDIFF (YEAR, birthday, (TRY_CONVERT (DATE, LEFT(st.[start_at], 10)))) AS age,
	DATEDIFF (MINUTE, (TRY_CONVERT (DATE, LEFT(st.[start_at], 10))), (TRY_CONVERT (DATE, LEFT(st.[ended_at], 10)))) AS trip_duration
FROM [dbo].[staging_trip] st
JOIN [dbo].[staging_rider] sr ON st.[rider_id] = sr.[rider_id];
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.fact_trip
GO

-- DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.fact_trip
-- GO
